statements: UPDATE yield_data SET crop_type='Wheat', location='Farm A' WHERE date='2022-01-15'
UPDATE yield_data SET yield=8.5, location='Farm B', crop_type='Corn' WHERE date='2022-02-20'
UPDATE yield_data SET yield = 8.5, location = 'Field A' WHERE crop_type = 'Corn' AND date = '2022-09-15';
UPDATE yield_data SET location = 'Field B', yield = 9.2 WHERE date = '2022-10-03' AND crop_type = 'Wheat';
UPDATE yield_data SET quality_score = 8, yield = 0.75 WHERE location = 'Farm A' AND date = '2021-10-15';
UPDATE productivity_analysis SET trend_analysis = 'Stable', productivity_change = 0.12 WHERE date = '2021-10-15';
UPDATE yield_data SET yield_amount = 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trends SET value = 25.5 WHERE trend_type = 'Harvest' AND id = 3;
UPDATE yield_data SET crop_type = 'Maize', yield_amount = 100 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE trends SET value = 5.5, trend_type = 'Seasonal' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE YieldData SET yield_amount = 200 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Trends SET description = 'New trend description' WHERE trend_id = 3;
UPDATE YieldData SET yield_amount = 25.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Trends SET trend_name = 'New Trend', description = 'Updated Description' WHERE trend_id = 3;
